name: Event Horizon (itch) (Josiah Purtlebaugh)
description:
I took the time machine. I know it was wrong, but I had no choice. They came suddenly and without warning, so I took the time machine, but not to escape. I have to save my family and my homeworld.

I took the time machine to go to the same time, but in another place

Event Horizon is a space shooter where you fly in two directions at once so that you can save your homeworld and protect your family at the same time.

I created this game in about 20 hours for Global Game Jam 2022.
